title: Internet celebrity
summary: An Internet celebrity (also known as a social media influencer, social media personality, internet personality, or simply influencer) is a celebrity who has acquired or developed their fame and notability through the Internet. The rise of social media has helped people increase their outreach to a global audience. Today, popular influencers are found on popular online platforms such as Twitch, Instagram, YouTube, Snapchat, Twitter, Facebook, VSCO, Reddit, WeChat, QQ, and TikTok.[1][2]
